Room.Name: Blue Skies Over Vallenda Plains
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the western end of Vallenda Pass. 60.n3.e0.s0.w26
Room.LongDescription: Not far to the north is the western entrance to the pass between the dark mountains. If you follow the pass to the east, you will eventually come to the village of Brownhaven, and farther east is the city of Kista. To the north is Prince Ragnar's castle. The Vallenda Plains are west of here.
